about_the_game:
The Offworld Station Booster DLC offers over 160 assets to create your own off-world base. It includes corridors, rooms, machines, boxes & crates for storage, monitors and a selection of furniture and props.

Whether you're planning a full working base, an abandoned station, or a mix of both, you'll find what you need here.

Many of the models allow full control of the emissive via GameGuru MAX materials properties, offering adjustments to light intensity and color.

The Off-World Station Booster Pack includes:

4 x Corridor Straights
1 x Corridor Corner
1 x Corridor T-Junction
1 x 4 Way Intersect
1 x Corridor Dead End
1 x Corridor Cross Section
7 x Rooms
Several interconnecting, animated doors
Connecting stairs and ramps
Multiple parts for corridor and room construction
1 x Health Pack
11 x boxes and barrels
1 x Animated Alien Blob
A selection of Office furniture and props
Desks and monitor screens
Various Sci-Fi machines
detailed_description:
The Offworld Station Booster DLC offers over 160 assets to create your own off-world base. It includes corridors, rooms, machines, boxes & crates for storage, monitors and a selection of furniture and props.

Whether you're planning a full working base, an abandoned station, or a mix of both, you'll find what you need here.

Many of the models allow full control of the emissive via GameGuru MAX materials properties, offering adjustments to light intensity and color.

The Off-World Station Booster Pack includes:

4 x Corridor Straights
1 x Corridor Corner
1 x Corridor T-Junction
1 x 4 Way Intersect
1 x Corridor Dead End
1 x Corridor Cross Section
7 x Rooms
Several interconnecting, animated doors
Connecting stairs and ramps
Multiple parts for corridor and room construction
1 x Health Pack
11 x boxes and barrels
1 x Animated Alien Blob
A selection of Office furniture and props
Desks and monitor screens
Various Sci-Fi machines
legal_notice:
"License Terms for DLC usage:

You have the right to use these DBO files and related texture files in any GameGuru MAX game you create and are free to distribute your games for free or commercially.

You may not distribute any of these files in any format, either singly, as part of an asset model pack, or via any other means, apart from the exceptions stated above.

You may not use these files, in any way, with any other game creation tool (eg Unity, Unreal, etc).
All files, including, but not limited to, 3D Models, Images, Audio, and behaviors, are created by third-party artists and are the sole property of the respective artist.

All files included in the DLC, are licensed to TheGameCreators by the legal copyright holder and are used with permission.
You can contact the author of this asset if you wish to license the model in other formats or for other means.

To esquire about distribution rights, please contact the original author using the information provided."

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 | AMD Opteron 4274 HE, or better.
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 | AMD Radeon R9 Fury, with 4 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer (64-bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel i7-9700K | AMD 3700X, or better.
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 | Radeon 5700 XT, with 8 GB VRAM, or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
  • Additional Notes: Windows-compatible keyboard and mouse

short_description: The Off-World Station Booster DLC iincludes over 160 assets allowing you to create your own off-world station within GameGuru MAX, including corridors, rooms, barrels, crates, monitors, Sci-Fi machines - and loads more!!!
